DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the relative bioequivalency comparing Geneva's 10 mg Glipizide tablets to Roerig's 10 mg Glucotrol tablets.
DOC.brief_title: To Demonstrate the Relative Bioequivalency Comparing Geneva's 10 mg Glipizide Tablets To Roerig's 10 mg Glucotrol Tablets
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
